required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomized, Double-blind Study of the Effects of Fenretinide Administered in Subjects With Obesity
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 2 Study of the Assessment of the Insulin Sensitizing Activity of Fenretinide in Subjects With Insulin Resistance With BMI >30Kg/m2, and Liver Inflammation Related to Non-alcoholic Fatty Liver

brief_summary.textblock: Many metabolic complications of obesity are a consequence of abnormal responses of the liver, muscle, and fat to insulin actions. Fenretinide may improve the effects of insulin, preventing metabolic complications.

clinical_study.why_stopped: This study was terminated due to expired drug with possibility of re-starting in the future.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the Effect on Insulin Resistance
primary_outcome.description: This study was terminated due to expired drug with possibility of re-starting in the future. For this reason the randomization code has not been broken and the data has not been analyzed and there is no way to report the outcome measures.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the Biochemical Response in Cholesterol, Glucose and Related Blood Tests.
secondary_outcome.description: This study was terminated due to expired drug with possibility of re-starting in the future. For this reason the randomization code has not been broken and the data has not been analyzed and there is no way to report the outcome measures.

arm_group.description: Subjects in this cohort will be given Fenretinide
Subjects in this cohort will be given placebo.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI >30
Exclusion Criteria:
- Diabetes Requiring Medication
- Poorly Controlled Co-Morbidities

overall_official.affiliation: University of California, San Diego and San Diego VA Healthcare Medical Center

facility.name: University of California at San Diego Hospitals

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: This study was terminated due to expired drug with possibility of re-starting in the future. For this reason the randomization code has not been broken and the data has not been analyzed and there is no way to report the participant flow.

group.title: A- Fenretinide
group.description: Subjects in this cohort will be given Fenretinide Fenretinide: 200 mg/day

group.title: B-Placebo
group.description: Subjects in this cohort will be given placebo. Placebo: 2 capsules/day

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
